samples.comment: It was AI and totally did not resolve my issue and there is no clear way to move to the next step to get it resolved

Spark AI stopped working. I tried various things before contacting you including looking at your support pages which were of no help. You could have troubleshooting information for this problem. I'm still not sure the problem was at my end. You make it sound like it couldn't possibly be a fault at your end.

In response to the aspect of not being able to find the serial number, the reply from your AI support said I should do what I had already explained is impossible which is to pull back the cover on the Spark Go. If it has a cover and I don't think it has, it is so thick Popeye wouldn't be able to shift it and I'm not going to force it and risk damaging it just because you won't listen. What do you make hard to find it for in the first place? I connect to my phone in the app so why don't you include the serial number there? I'm logged in. Surely it can't be hard to link my account and serial number. It is a perennial problem that companies create problems and then pretend they haven't by saying 'do this' as if that is accurate and easy which it rarely is. I was going to give this feedback in response until I saw it says 'Devin' is not a real person. It's good that you make clear you are using AI support but it stifles feedback and dialogue.
I‘d appreciate a personal message from the  Team regarding my issue and not an AI generated message. Unfortunately the info I got was not satisfying as it did not cointained much new info.

The response "came from" AI and was totally wrong the first time. I did try again and I did get a response, but cannot trust it as I believe it is just picking info from your website which I can read myself.

It’s almost impossible to get the right answers from an AI bot. It’s absolutely necessary to speak to a human being to relay the information necessary to get my amp repaired. At this point the only solution is to buy a new one and they didn’t even give me a price to exchange my old amp. 
I’m thinking that I have to go with another company because I’m a performer and need my gear ASAP . It all needs to be reprogrammed and test before I start in front of an audience.
Using an Ai bot to reply to questions is bullshit.  The answer was bullshit and you put people out of work. Fuck you for doing that. It honestly Makes me regret buying your product

The initial support with AI was helpful although it could not solve the issue. The interaction with the staff members was frustrating, where two members of staff were not communicating clear with each other. This resulted in me going through the same procedure again to try and resolve the issue. I had a sense that they thought I did not know what I was doing hence the repeating of steps and videos.

the instructions I received via email was NOT correct / detailed enough. I followed the email instructions - entered my email address: then entered the password provided: after doing so I was unable to change my password. I logged out, went back to the email, re-read the email; followed instructions AGAIN. I found that after I logged in I was NOT able to change password. I then logged out AGAIN, went back to your website, entered my email address ( I did NOT enter the password provided ), then clicked on forgot password. Your website then sent me a link to change my password - that worked PERFECTLY.
devin still needs improvement
I was pleased to get a response, but as it was AI generated it didn't really tell me anything that I hadn't already tried. I have now updated the App, but the problem is unchanged.
Still waiting for a solution to problem with YouTube videos not visible during song playback Error code 15.
AI generated and didnt take into consideration the customer loyalty

The ai response i think would be ok for most cases. But did not go in depth enough for me, I managed to solve my problem by using chatgot but wyth many more queries. I think it is best to have an open forum where people post problems, and you can see what solutions worked for them

Fuck you, your product and your fucking AI.
I WILL SELL THIS PIECE OF SHIT ASAP!!!

I've only succeeded in communicating with an AI, which basically gave me a load of jobs to do, some of which would have meant wiping all sorts of settings and account data in Chrome, which would only make it more inconvenient. I've tried the steps I deemed safe, but still have the same problem ("This video is unavailable. Error code: 15"), and now have a new problem as my presets have all been wiped out. Not impressed.
The AI appeared to understand the problem correctly and made reasonably suggestions for how to solve it, but none of them worked.
The problem still exists, with no answers from a real person.
Some of the ideas brought to me by AI helped a little, but not to the extent of solving my issue.

your response to clear the apps cache did not resolve the issue.

Still receiving "This video is unavailable Error Code 15" when trying to play any video.

Support was an Ai response that didn't work on what you stated was a known error (Error code 15) other forums stated this didn't work. PG should be coming out with a resolution or response to all customers to update us or sort the issue, very disappointing

In researching this matter, it appears that there have been many requests about the use of the Spark with this Looper yet no one from Positive Grid has reached out to see if there can be a resolution. Like a file update? etc. The response from PG seems to be its not our problem, which is true I guess but wondering why PG hasn't considered being part of the solution either?
I‘d appreciate a personal message from the  Team regarding my issue and not an AI generated message. Unfortunately the info I got was not satisfying as it did not cointained much new info.
Whilst the advice recovered all the built-in presets, I lost all my user created tones.

I have a Spark 40 that quit working, was offered a discount to replace it and opted for that.  All good.  Then I was told I would receive reimbursement for shipping initially then later told I would not receive reimbursement for shipping. NOT GOOD!  I spent $150 dollars on the toatl transaction - for the dollars I would have been better off buying a new Spark 50.  I asked for this and was denied...  Very irritated,

Devin (AI) gave incorrect information. I had to research further then ask AI if I needed a male XLR to TRS cable to use the cab in conjunction with the Spark 2. The AI confirmed this. You have to ask the right question to get the right answer. Without knowledge Positive Grid customer support was not forthcoming with the correct answer to my issue.
Spark does Not work anymore...settings permissions etc are the same. Deinstall /install  New were Not helpfull
Followed instructions still have the same problem

The apps cannot read Youtube backing track with error code 15. If i can speak to a human, it would be appreciated and even more if it’s on french language please.
Best regards, Steve P.
AI messages missed the real issue and delayed the RMA process….,
Geen steun gekregen, ik wacht nog steeds de app doet alles maar kan de video niet afspelen,foutcode 15,  ook ge updat, app eraf en weer er op doet het niet
Still getting error 15 video unavsolable. Uninstallled then reinstalled version 4.4.0.7742. No luck.
It is an app fault. It occurs on both my devices

The "support" was a generic AI comment. Thats not a support. I can do it myself and in real time, not via mail, with any Chat GPT or Gemini etc.
